message: On the other side is a square room.
It's just as rusty as the warehouse, but there's a shape in the middle, about the size of a person.
I realize that the shape is bound with thick, sturdy chains.
In the darkness, I approach the shape and peer through one of the gaps between the chains.
When I see what's there... my breath catches in my throat.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mink...!"
Beneath the chains is a metal chair. Mink is sitting in it... no, bound to it.
His head is lowered, so I can't see his face, but I doubt he could move so much as a finger.
I have to get those chains off.
The moment my fingers touch the chains, I feel a numbing zap as sparks fly through the air. I quickly pull my hand back.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Fuck!"
One more time...!
Again, the shock forces me back. This isn't going to work.
What can I do?
A thought comes to me.
It's rejecting me.
I'm inside Mink's head. He controls everything.
This Mink, bound from head to toe in chains, is what you might call Mink's "essence."
These chains... Mink believes himself trapped.
So first... I have to destroy that belief.
I reach out to him again.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mink... You can move. Hurry up and get out of there."
At the sound of my voice, the chain beneath my hand crumbles.
I reach for a larger chain further inside.
This time, when I touch the chain, a plume of smoke shoots out. I jerk my hand back.
My fingers are stained reddish brown where they touched the chain.
In the blink of an eye, that stain spreads across my hand and starts to climb up my arm.
It's rust. The same rust that covers every inch of this space.
I scream, shaking my hand frantically.
It feels hot, like a burn, but cold at the same time.
Mink... You want to keep me out that badly?!
I brace myself and reach out with my other hand.
Once again, a cloud of smoke billows out, covering me with rust. At the same time, more chains descend from the ceiling.
The chains slam into my rusted arms as they coil around Mink's body.
And my arms... shatter like glass.
I nearly pass out from the pain.
My knees give out. Sweat blurs my vision.
I know it's not real... but it's too much. Too much!
Mink hasn't moved a muscle.

Why... 
Why are you pushing me away?
No...
I won't give up. Not now...!

Reject me all you want...
I'm going to destroy you!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ugh... Ugaaaah...!"
Fighting through the pain, I rise to my feet.
My arms are gone. So I'll just have to―
I clamp my jaw around one of the chains.
I rear back, trying to tear it away.
More chains lash out, aiming for me.
Is there no hope?!
Mink...!
Just then, Mink lifts his head a fraction.
And then―
He opens his eyes and looks straight at me.
